title: Part 1: Windy City Heat Revist + Listener Calls (ACS October 21)
itunes:title: Part 1: Windy City Heat Revist + Listener Calls (ACS October 21)
description:
Adam recaps the recent Hollywood Improv Show he performed with Jeremy Piven, Brad Williams, and the Sklar brothers, and shows the gang part of Jennifer Lopez’s Netflix documentary 'Halftime'. Adam talks about one of his recent ‘Take a Knee’ guests who created the ‘12-Hour Walk’ and revisits an iconic scene from ‘Windy City Heat’. The gang takes some listener calls from someone who wants to take a deeper dive into “Black People React” videos and another who wonders if Kanye deserves all the hate he’s been getting. 

PLUGS:

Watch Fisher Stevens’ documentary series, ‘The Lincoln Project’ airing now on Showtime

Go to ConvoyOfHope.org to support hurricane Ian relief 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

Geico.com

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST
